name: Lil Texas
cleanBio:
Lil Texas, a high-velocity music icon, has made waves globally with his groundbreaking kicks, featuring on labels like Masters Of Hardcore, Afterlife, and Barong Family. Collaborating with artists like Kayzo, Dorian Electra, and Deadly Guns, he's shown versatility across genres. His albums “Faster” and “Too Fast” have solidified his dance music status.

He's drawn attention from stars like Lady Gaga and Elton John, remixing their single “Sine From Above”. Also influencing fashion, he scored Rick Owens' Spring/Summer 2023 Men's Fashion Show in Paris.

As a live DJ, Lil Texas excels, with sets starting at 160 BPM and reaching the fastest dance music tempos. He's performed at major festivals like EDC Las Vegas, Tomorrowland, and Ultra Music Festival. Following a successful TEXCORE USA Tour, he's preparing for the 2024 “PLANET TEXCORE” World Tour.
